    gui.listener

    • Uses of CanvasPanel in gui.listener

      Constructors in gui.listener with parameters of type CanvasPanel 
      Constructor and Description
      ButtonListener(ButtonPanel bp, CanvasPanel cP)
      Initialises each pane to allow for methods such as showing solution stats to be used.
      MouseInterListener(CanvasPanel cp, ButtonPanel bp)
      Initialises each pane to allow for methods such as showing solution stats to be used.
      MousePositionListener(CanvasPanel cp, ButtonPanel bp)
      Initialises each pane to allow for methods such as showing mouse coords to be used.
